synthesis_conditions.temperature: Room temperature for mixing, slow evaporation for crystal formation

solvents.name: Ethanol
solvents.amount: Equal volume to water for pyrazine and pyridine-N-oxide solution

synthesis_conditions.additional_notes: The synthesis involves mixing CuCl2·2H2O and AgPF6 in water to form a pale blue solution, which is then mixed with a solution of pyrazine and pyridine-N-oxide in water and ethanol. The mixture is left to slowly evaporate to form crystals.

synthesis_conditions.temperature: Room temperature for mixing, slow evaporation for crystal formation
synthesis_conditions.equipment: Vacuum filtration for solid removal, perforated Al-foil for covering

chemicals_used.name: Chemicals similar to [Cu(pyz)2(pyO)2](PF6)2
chemicals_used.ratio: Pyrazine to pyridine-N-oxide ratio adjusted to 2:1

synthesis_conditions.additional_notes: The synthesis procedure is similar to that of [Cu(pyz)2(pyO)2](PF6)2 but with the ratio of pyrazine to pyridine-N-oxide adjusted to 2:1. The solution is covered with perforated Al-foil to allow slow solvent evaporation.
